Key:
(One week had passed. Rinne is here, Maria is here.
Everyone's here. The usual daily lives in this world.)

(But Rio wasn't here. And Marina who accepted the
powers from Rio as well...)
(But then it all changed today.)
I'll be waiting.

(A text with just three words. No location.
A one-sided promise. But this text had so
much meaning. I don't know why, but that's how I felt.)

(So I came here. The place I met Marina for the first
time. She should be―)
(―Found you. I knew you'd be here.)

Aww, man. So you did find me. It's been... about a
week?

Yeah. I was worried. I couldn't find you... So I
thought maybe you were still in Maria.
Hey, Shido Itsuka... This world is huge.

Yeah it is. The starry skies are all connected. But
this Eden is―
―It's connected.
Huh?

(My mind went blank. Eden was a closed off
wonderland. We shouldn't be able to leave Tengu City.
A rule made to keep the world repeating itself.)

Why do you look so dumbfounded? This Eden changed
its settings since I became the Ruler. No, I changed
them.
You changed its settings?

Time will not loop infinitely―it will only move
forward. There is no end of the world. That is what
this new Eden is. It goes until Shido Itsuka dies.
Until I die? Then you and Rinne can only exist...

That's right. Maybe 30 or 50 years... Or it could be
10 years.

Is that okay with you? The promise you made with
Rio...

It's fine like this. Humans die someday, too. Rinne
Sonogami and I received a future from Rio to live as
humans.
A future to live as humans...

It's nothing special. This is all a dream. A dream
that you'll forget when you wake up. So you can do
anything, and everything will come true.
A dream, huh... I see.

(So if I die, Eden will end, and we'll forget
everything and return back to the original world.)

(That just means that everyone living in this town
will be guaranteed a future. Even if that means they
have to live a fake daily life for a little while.)

So that's why I decided to live life to the fullest. I
want to live this life, the time that Rio gave, one
step at a time. It's precious.
I'm rooting for you, Marina. I want to help if I can.
Really? You really think you will?

Why would I lie about this? Unlike you, I keep the
promises I make.
Then come here.
Okay.

(I did as she asked and went to the stairs. Then
Marina, who was a few steps before me, reached for
me―)
If I do this, I can look you straight in the face.

Well guys are usually taller... Hey wait, what are you
doing...?!

I told you that I'm going to live life to the fullest,
didn't I? So I am going to do what I want.
So how does this connect?

...Well, I don't blame you for being confused. I'm not
very honest, and you're very dull about these things.
Um, I don't get it at all...

That's why I said you're a dummy. There's only one
reason why we're like this.

(She looked straight at me. It was similar to when
Maria looked into my eyes before―)
I love you... Shido Itsuka.

(I was so shy that I wanted to turn away, but Marina
had her arms around my neck and wouldn't let me.)

I can't help it. You're the first person I've been
honest with. I mean you're always looking after me, I
can't help but get the wrong idea.
Well... I was.

It's fine. This is me confessing my love to you. But
Rio called me Mother.

(Rio did call Marina Mother before she disappeared.
She called Rinne Mama, but she referred to Marina
as one who raised her as mother.)

I can't run away then, can I? Until I tell Father how
I really feel about him.
Marina...

You don't have to give me an answer. Even if you
chose another person, it won't change the fact that
I have feelings for you. This is real.
So let me take my first step, okay?

(I felt her breath as it neared. The somewhat sweet
scent of a girl. I could feel my heart starting to
race.)

(Marina looked a little scared, and that made my heart
pound for her. If we ended up not kissing, I felt like
she'd disappear... so I let the kiss happen.)

(Her acting tough was all an act. Deep down, she felt
lonely. I felt like Marina's emotion flowed inside me
through her soft lips.)

(I want to help Marina. I want to be by her side when
she's feeling lonely. But I think... it's still not
love yet.)

(As our lips parted, Marina's eyes opened. For a
second, I wanted to linger, but reason made it go
away.)

Sorry. I still don't know... if I have feelings for
you or not.

I know that already. Shido, you're too nice, so I
know you can't decide on the most important person
for yourself.
I guess huh... Pathetic, huh?
Seriously, you're so pathetic... Hehe.
D-Don't laugh... I mean, I know it's kind of true...

Yeah... But Shido, when you kissed me, you kind of
looked like a pretty cool adult.
What do you mean by that...?
Shido, you say that, but I know you know.
No, I have no idea what you're talking about...

(It's true. Before we kissed, I kind of felt like I
was floating from the heat...)
Gosh... Then I'll do it so you know. Please?
Um, what are you going to do?

(As I said that, I felt my heart pounding fast again.
Maybe I'm not as nice as I thought..)
It's easy―We do it again.
(And then Marina laughed like a girl playing a joke.)
